biography: Rasmus, a celebrated member of Vihti Golf Club, is known for his contemplative approach to the game. While his appearances at the Hector Trophée have been limited to one, his presence is always felt, often seen observing from the sidelines with a keen eye.

Though Rasmus has not secured a Victor Trophy or a Hector Trophée victory to date, his dedication to golf is beyond reproach. Known for his insightful post-round analyses, Rasmus brings a unique perspective to the sport.

Currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, there is always a glimmer of hope for fans that Rasmus might make a return. His strategic mind and calm demeanor would undoubtedly be an asset to any team.
